complaints.text: My FRA claim application has been pending for over 8 months without any update. I have submitted all required documents but haven't received any communication from the district office.
complaints.resolution_note: Case under review. Site verification scheduled for next week.

complaints.text: I was eligible for PMAY-G scheme but my name was not included in the beneficiary list despite multiple applications. Need assistance to understand the selection process.
Local forest department is preventing us from accessing traditional forest area that our community has been using for generations. They claim we don't have proper documentation.
complaints.resolution_note: CFR rights documented and community access restored. Proper signage installed to prevent future conflicts.

complaints.text: MGNREGA work allocation in our village is not transparent. Some families get more days of work while others get very few. Request for fair distribution system.
complaints.resolution_note: Investigation ongoing. Gram Panchayat meeting called to discuss work allocation process.

complaints.text: Boundary dispute with neighboring non-tribal farmers who are claiming part of our community forest land. Need survey and proper demarcation.
complaints.assigned_to: Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills

complaints.text: Van Dhan Kendra in our area is not functioning properly. Equipment is damaged and no training has been provided to process forest produce effectively.
complaints.resolution_note: Equipment repaired and new batch of training completed. Kendra is now operational with improved facilities.

complaints.text: My individual forest rights claim was rejected without proper explanation. I have been cultivating this land for over 15 years and have witness testimonies.
Illegal mining activities near our village are affecting water sources and traditional grazing areas. Need immediate intervention to stop environmental damage.
complaints.resolution_note: Site inspection completed. Show cause notice issued to mining company. Compliance monitoring ongoing.
